answers.answer: How do they do the glucose test? I'm 28 weeks and still haven't heard when ill have mine does everyone have one done?x
In Minnesota you take a drink and you wait an hour than they draw your blood and test the sugar. Usually it's done at 28 weeks
I had mine done at 25 weeks. It was 2 hours, blood drawn before taking the drink, an hour after and then 2 hours. It's not that bad, ask for fruit punch if they have it.

question: i am pregnant with baby number 4 and had my 1 hour glucose test and I failed it. I have never had a problem with this before. Now I have to take the 3 hour test and I'm kinda worried about the outcome and possibly having gestational diabetes! Any advice???
title: 1 hour glucose test!
